name: Open HMI Tester
tagline: "Open HMI Tester" is a GUI Testing tool following an open architecture that describes a non intrusive capture/replay tool based on GUI Events. It may be adapted to support different windowing systems and operating systems used in the testing environment.
body:
### +info and downloads

Current version is developed for Qt user interfaces.

Please, visit the project webpage for updated info and downloads: [OHT site](http://www.catedrasaes.org/wiki/OHT)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
